name: aerobe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a microorganism (= a very small living thing such as a bacterium) that grows in air or needs oxygen to live: antibacterial agents that are active against a variety of aerobes
More examplesFewer examplesThe infection is often produced by both aerobes and anaerobes from the genital tract.Anaerobic bacteria are involved in about 90% of cases, with about half of these mixed with aerobes.Enterococci are aerobes.
